TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Padding extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示与用户界面 (UI) 元素关联的空白或边距信息。

span.span: Represents padding or margin information associated with a user interface (UI) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构表示与矩形 UI 元素 (例如控件) 关联的填充或边距。The structure represents the padding or margin associated with a rectangular UI element such as a control. 填充是 UI 元素的正文与其边缘之间的内部空间。The padding is the internal space between the body of the UI element and its edge. 与此相反, 边距是指分离两个相邻 UI 元素的相邻边缘的距离。In contrast, a margin is the distance separating the adjoining edges of two adjacent UI elements. 由于结构上的相似性 , 用于表示填充和边距。Because of structural similarities, is used to represent both padding and margins. 有关演示控件上的和 属性的关系图, 请参阅[Windows 窗体控件中的边距和填充](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。For a diagram that illustrates the and properties on a control, see [Margin and Padding in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md). 对于容器上的控件, 填充具有不同的效果, 而不是在不是的控件上。Padding has a different effect on controls that are containers than on controls that are not. 例如, 在控件中 , 属性定义及其子控件的边框之间的间距。For example, in a control, the property defines the spacing between the border of the and its child controls. 对于控件, 属性定义控件边框和其包含的文本之间的间距。 For a control, the property defines the spacing between the border of the control and its contained text. 除了典型的方法和属性之外, 还定义以下类型级成员:In addition to typical methods and properties, also defines the following type-level members: - 字段, 表示预定义的, 无填充。 The field, which represents a predefined with no padding. - 一组用于执行类的常见算术运算的运算符, 例如将两个对象相加。A set of operators for performing common arithmetic operations for the class, such as adding two objects together. 对于不支持运算符重载的语言, 可以使用替代方法语法来调用这些成员。For languages that do not support operator overloading, you can invoke these members by using alternative method syntax. - 、和属性 , 提供可方便在自定义布局计算中使用的组合值。 The , , and properties, which provide combined values that are convenient for use in custom layout calculations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 "填充" 属性来创建围绕控件的轮廓。The following code example demonstrates how to use the Padding property to create an outline around a control. 有关完整的代码清单, 请[参阅如何:使用填充](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md)围绕 Windows 窗体控件创建边框。For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Border Around a Windows Forms Control Using Padding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Padding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Padding/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Padding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Padding/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置所有边缘的空白值。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding value for all the edges.

value.span: 如果所有边缘的空白相同，则为其空白值（以像素为单位）；否则为 -1。

span.span: The padding, in pixels, for all edges if the same; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索此属性时, 如果所有边缘均使用相同的填充值, 则返回此公共值。When retrieving this property, if all the edges use the same padding value, then this common value is returned. 否则, 将返回-1, 表示所有填充值都不相等。Otherwise, -1 is returned to indicate that all the padding values are not equal. 设置此值将更改、 、 和属性。Setting this value changes the , , , and properties.

summary.span: 生成当前 的哈希代码。

span.span: Generates a hash code for the current .

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用、、和值生成表示当前的32位哈希代码。 The method uses the , , , and values to generate a 32-bit hash code that represents the current . 哈希代码是与对象的值相对应的数字 (因此具有相同值的两个对象应生成相同的哈希代码)。A hash code is a number that corresponds to the value of an object (so two objects that have the same value should generate the same hash code). 哈希代码用于对对象的集合进行排序和存储。Hash codes are used to sort and store collections of objects. 例如, 表示根据键的哈希代码进行组织的键/值对的集合。For example, a represents a collection of key-and-value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key. 有关哈希代码和哈希函数的详细信息, 请参阅方法。For more information on hash codes and hash functions, see the method.
